description: Scalable video encoding intended to serve the same applications as the MPEG-4 Simple Profile (mobile audio-visual services, low-complexity video for the Internet, and small camera devices that record to disk or memory chips) with added support for temporal and spatial scalability.

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: ISO/IEC 14496-2:2004. Information technology -- Coding of audio-visual objects -- Part 2: Visual. Simple Scalable Profile (formal name); MPEG-4, Visual Coding, Simple Scalable Profile (common name)
